title: How to Heat Brownies

steps.headline: Position a small metal frame over toaster.
Place the brownie on top of the frame.
Adjust the toaster to the high setting.
Leave on the toaster until the brownie is warmed to your liking.
The brownie should be warm and ready to serve.
Remove all wrappings and place brownies on an oven-approved cookie sheet.
Heat oven to 150 degrees Centigrade (roughly 300 degrees Fahrenheit).
Leave in the oven until the brownie is warmed to your liking.
The brownie should be warm and ready to serve.
Remove all wrappings and place brownies on a microwave-approved plate.
Microwave until the brownie is warmed to your liking (normally around 30 seconds).
The brownie should be warm and ready to serve.

text: Toaster Oven Position a small metal frame over toaster.  Place the brownie on top of the frame.  Switch on the toaster.  Adjust the toaster to the high setting.  Leave on the toaster until the brownie is warmed to your liking.  The brownie should be warm and ready to serve.  Conventional Oven Remove all wrappings and place brownies on an oven-approved cookie sheet.  Heat oven to 150 degrees Centigrade (roughly 300 degrees Fahrenheit).  Leave in the oven until the brownie is warmed to your liking.  The brownie should be warm and ready to serve.  Microwave Oven Remove all wrappings and place brownies on a microwave-approved plate.  Microwave until the brownie is warmed to your liking (normally around 30 seconds).  The brownie should be warm and ready to serve.
